summary: Primary Thumbnail Selection feature testing complete. All 11 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all components: thumbnail gallery display, click-to-select functionality, green ring and 'Primary' badge on selected thumbnail, 'Set as Primary' hover state on non-primary thumbnails, success toast notification, and View button opens thumbnail without triggering selection.
passed_tests: Backend validates asset exists and belongs to submission (returns 404 for wrong submission)
Backend validates asset is of type 'Thumbnail' (returns 400 for non-thumbnail)
Backend updates isPrimaryThumbnail flag on all related thumbnails
Backend returns 404 for non-existent asset ID
Backend returns 404 for non-existent submission ID
Backend returns 422 for missing assetId in request body
Backend correctly switches primary between multiple thumbnails
Frontend SubmissionDetailPage shows thumbnail gallery with 3 thumbnails
Clicking a thumbnail calls the API and updates the UI
Primary thumbnail shows green ring/border and 'Primary' badge with checkmark
Non-primary thumbnails show 'Set as Primary' hover state
Toast notification 'Primary thumbnail updated!' appears on successful selection
View button opens thumbnail in new tab without triggering selection
critical_code_review_comments: Backend endpoint correctly validates asset ownership and type before updating
Frontend correctly uses data-testid attributes for all interactive elements
Toast notification includes helpful description 'This thumbnail will be used for publishing'
View button uses e.stopPropagation() to prevent triggering selection
UI correctly updates local state after API call without requiring page refresh
